title: Manage a Publisher - Netskope Knowledge Portal
content: After deploying your Publisher, use the following sections to make modifications to your Publishers. Upgrade a Publisher to Ubuntu 22.04 LTS Publisher Logs for Troubleshooting Guidance for Installing 3rd-party Applications on Publishers Configure Publisher Auto-Updates Upgrade a Publisher for PRC (China) Enable Kernel Updates Configure a Publisher for Software Updates via Explicit Proxy Enable SNMP on a Publisher Publisher Filtering and Exporting Options Publisher Monitoring Re-enroll a Publisher Disable Password Expiry for a Publisher
